Presented at 2024 International Conference on Electrical Machines (ICEM), Torino, Italy This study develops a predictive model for partial discharge inception voltage (PDIV) in turn-to-turn insulation of form-wound windings for inverter-fed motors considering a range of altitudes, from ground to cruise levels.
